modal.title: Demo Modal
modal.desc: This is a demo modal. You can use this area to show any custom content, actions, or information for your users.
modal.info: This is a demo modal for showcasing custom actions and content.

toast.warning: Your session will expire in 5 minutes
toast.fileUploadText: Your document has been uploaded and processed successfully.
toast.unsavedText: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save before leaving?
toast.criticalText: The operation could not be completed. Please contact support if this issue persists.
toast.updateText: Version 2.1.0 is ready to install with new features and bug fixes.
toast.updateStarted: Update started! Application will restart automatically.
toast.updatePostponed: Update postponed. You'll be reminded in 24 hours.

consent.title: Analytics & Cookies
consent.intro: Anonymous analytics are enabled by default to help us improve the experience. You can remove consent at any time in settings.
bullets: Helps fix issues and prioritize features.
You may opt-out at any time.

feedback.removed: Consent removed. Only essential events and anonymous session data are sent.
feedback.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove consent? Analytics will be disabled except for essential events.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service govern your use of the {{ org }} landing page. By continuing to browse or interact with this website, you agree to these terms.

sections.title: Purpose and Content
sections.text: This landing page showcases our services and provides educational content. Information is provided as-is and may change without notice.

sections.title: Acceptable Use
sections.text: You agree not to misuse the site, attempt unauthorized access, or interfere with its operation. Any abuse may result in restricted access.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.text: All trademarks, logos, and content displayed are property of their respective owners and may not be reused without permission.

sections.title: Privacy and Analytics
sections.text: We use anonymous analytics, subject to your consent, to improve performance and user experience. See 'Use of Data' for details.

data.title: Data Privacy
data.intro: Analytics are enabled by default. We collect minimal, privacyâ€‘respecting information to improve this site. You may remove consent at any time.
points: Anonymous analytics are enabled by default. No personal data is required for basic usage.
Technical metrics (e.g., device, language, viewport, performance) help us fix issues and prioritize improvements.
If you remove consent, only essential events, session ID, and local ID are sent.
You may remove consent at any time by updating preferences.
data.consentNote: Analytics are enabled by default. By removing consent, only essential events and anonymous session data are sent.
